programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: This documentary will tell us: who the Muslim Brotherhood is, where they come from, what they want, how they are different from the other Muslim groups in Iraq and Afghanistan and where they're going. It will look at what sort of power and influence they will have in the coming months and what this means for Egypt and the rest of the world. And finally, it will look at how the Egyptian situation will affect the latest attempts at peace in Israel

programme.title: Ljudska vrsta iz svemira
Mankind From Space
programme.desc: Mankind From Space is an epic journey of discovery using satellite data and astonishing CGI to tell the story of humankind's ascent from hunter-gatherer to dominant global species. From the eye-popping perspective of space, special reveals the breathtaking extent of our influence; how we have transformed vast swathes of our planet and produced an interconnected world of extraordinary complexity

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: National Geographic Channel's hit series returns with a new episode featuring twelve of the deadliest creatures hiding in the forest. They hunt in the dense underbrush, high in the forest canopy and emerge from underground to do battle on the forest floor. Each one of these animals is equipped with unique adaptations for survival - including deadly weaponry and cunning strategies. But the forest is more than a backdrop in the brutal struggle for survival. Often it plays a key role. Its foliage offers camouflage for stealth attacks, its trees provide a platform from which powerful carnivores launch their assaults and its rich food resources attract plenty of prey. The forest is a complex environment, shaping the lives of every creature in it

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
World's deadliest animals
programme.desc: The Desert and Grassland's Deadly Dozen begins with the world's fastest rattler: the sidewinder. Then we travel to Africa for a close up look at one of the world's deadliest - and tiniest - arachnids, the six-eyed sand spider. Next, the beautiful and highly toxic zebra snake. On the open savannahs, three top predators rule the plains by working together - the African lion, the cheetah, and the spotted hyena. Next we take a closer look at three deadly deceivers, the desert death adder, the western coral snake, and the African wild dog. But humans take dangerous risks when they ignore the boundaries set by massive plant eaters - black rhinos and American bison. Finally, the hour concludes with one man's firsthand account of what it's like to face down the largest creature walking the Earth: the African Elephant

programme.title: Majstor katastrofe
Master of Disaster
programme.desc: Although there has never been a suicide bus bomb blast in the United States, experts agree it could happen in any American city, at anytime. A bus bomb attack is a gruesome scene, not only killing people on the bus but also injuring and killing people outside the bus as well; a terrifying scenario that authorities in the United States want to train for so that they can effectively save as many lives as possible. Join master of disaster Tim Samaras and his team of top scientists as they scientifically re-create the "perfect" terrorist crime scene, analyze their unique blast data and develop ground breaking emergency response plans that could one day, help save lives

programme.title: Iza kulisa
Inside
programme.desc: This documentary will tell us: who the Muslim Brotherhood is, where they come from, what they want, how they are different from the other Muslim groups in Iraq and Afghanistan and where they're going. It will look at what sort of power and influence they will have in the coming months and what this means for Egypt and the rest of the world. And finally, it will look at how the Egyptian situation will affect the latest attempts at peace in Israel

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: We explore the lives of two different preppers who fear the end of the world as we know it is fast approaching. In Gun Barrel City, Texas, Kenny is preparing for a civil war. Kenny is building the ultimate fortified rooftop command center to defend his property against marauders. Next, we go inside lives of the Poole family as they build a customized bunker together in preparation for an EMP. We join these two preppers as they prepare for doomsday

programme.title: Znanost glupog, ep. 11
Science of Stupid
programme.desc: In this episode, Richard Hammond explores the potential to embarrass, injure and humiliate yourself when riding a zip line, playing on swings or merely trying to swallow powdered cinnamon

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: A look at how breakthroughs in technology are being applied to humans, not only for more effective repairs, but also for upgrading the brain(c)

programme.title: Ljudska vrsta iz svemira
Mankind From Space
programme.desc: Mankind From Space is an epic journey of discovery using satellite data and astonishing CGI to tell the story of humankind's ascent from hunter-gatherer to dominant global species. From the eye-popping perspective of space, special reveals the breathtaking extent of our influence; how we have transformed vast swathes of our planet and produced an interconnected world of extraordinary complexity

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan

Next, we go inside lives of the Poole family as they build a customized bunker together in preparation for an EMP. We join these two preppers as they prepare for doomsday

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Follow Dr. Zeb Hogan, National Geographic Explorer and an aquatic ecologist on his journey to find the largest freshwater fish in Australia - the freshwater sawfish, a cross between a shark and a chainsaw. These amazing monsters are nearing extinction but here in Northern Australia is a stronghold of this elusive fish

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: What makes the most lethal snake on the entire planet? Is it a bone-crushing grip or venom so potent it can solidify human blood? In Deadliest Snakes, Dr. Brady Barr travels across four continents to crown the world's most fearsome snake. In his quest, Brady comes face-to-face with the Russell's viper, the deadliest snake in all of Asia whose venom can literally dissolve human flesh and veins

Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In this episode, we go inside the lives of two different families as they prepare for the end of the world. In rural Colorado we meet Dr. Dave and his wife Dee. They are prepping for an EMP caused by a solar flare, which they fear will lead to widespread illness and death due to the lack of medical care. In the hopes to save his family, Dave is building a mobile pharmacy so he can have a supply of traditional medicine. Next, we meet Richard Huggins in Fort Worth, Texas. He is preparing for Nuclear War by building and fortifying a pillbox with grenade launchers, a machine gun and claymore mines to keep his family safe. We join these two preppers as they as they prepare for Doomsday

programme.title: Neukroćena Amerika
Untamed Americas
programme.desc: Stunning HD cinematography produces an epic yet intimate journey through America's deserts. Everything in the desert lives and dies at the mercy of water. Dry, inhospitable wilderness, they are among the harshest, most extreme environments on the planet. Wind and water sculpt these thirst-lands into natural monuments… as unique as they are spectacular. But look closer and the desert reveals a SECRET WORLD of INTRIGUE… surprising stories of survival, epic perseverance… and things you've never seen before. All of America's deserts provide something… a hidden bounty for those who know where to find it… and how to use it. Title Final Yes

programme.title: Nordijska divljina
Nordic Wild
programme.desc: The shores of Scandinavia stretch for thousands of kilometers. Time and tide shape the land and the lives of the creatures that live here. It is a world of ceaseless change, in which animals live - literally - on the edge

programme.title: Znanost budućnosti Stephena Hawkinga
Stephen Hawking's Science of The Future
programme.desc: Discover a new age where machines talk to machines, sciences come together to form new disciplines, and new connections are made every day

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: Follow Dr Zeb Hogan, National Geographic Explorer and an aquatic biologist on his quest to find what could be the world's largest and most deadly freshwater fish - the giant freshwater stingray. We follow Zeb as he dives with a captive stingray for the very first time and hand feeds this monster of the deep

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Romulus Whitaker travels four continents in search of the world's largest crocodiles, encountering gharials, saltwater and Nile crocodiles

programme.title: Lica Biblije
Lost Faces of The Bible
programme.desc: Archaeologists unearthed a shocking discovery while excavating an ancient village in Israel- the skeletal remains of a tiny infant stored inside a clay jar. Six millennia ago, someone carefully buried this child under the foundations of a house- but why? Did a grieving mother decide to keep a child lost too soon close at hand? Or was this innocent sacrificed to appease the gods? In this episode of Lost Faces of the Bible, our team of archaeologists, scholars and forensic anthropologists explore humanity's history of sacrifice, while gathering information to help our forensic artists reveal the face of this mysterious child

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: Romulus Whitaker travels four continents in search of the world's largest crocodiles, encountering gharials, saltwater and Nile crocodiles

programme.title: Pripreme za Sudnji dan
Doomsday Preppers
programme.desc: In the ninth episode of Season 3, the preparation for an earthquake in the New Madrid seismic zone takes precedence when it comes to our two families. Both David Mays and David Nash prepare themselves and their families for a destined earthquake. David Mays is a pilot who relies on gadgets to protect his family from advancing destruction and also to provide assistance to neighbors in need. With his drones that he has rigged with cameras and defensive mechanisms, he plans to survey his surroundings on his way to his personal bug-out location. David Nash is a do-it-yourselfer who creates a geodesic dome that will house his family if a quake strikes. His preps include a water purification system, a homemade generator, and the reinforced earthquake shelter that also gathers water

programme.title: Istrage zrakoplovnih nesreća
Air crash investigation
programme.desc: Air France Flight #296 (Airbus A320) June 26th, 1988 The Airbus A-320 the worlds most sophisticated passenger jet takes off for its maiden passenger flight and first-ever public demonstration. The plane is headed for the Habsheim Air Show where the pilots are planning a breathtaking, low-altitude fly-over. But after getting into position over the tiny airfield the exhibition turns to disaster. The plane plows into a forest and is consumed by flames. It is a horrible tragedy, and a public relations nightmare for Airbus. With such a huge investment on the line, there is enormous pressure on investigators to determine whether the pilot or the plane was at fault

programme.title: Sekunde do katastrofe
Seconds from disaster
programme.desc: The use of the atomic bombs in World War II still excites controversy, particularly the necessity for the second bomb on Nagasaki. The argument that it was the only way to bring a swift end to the war, and save thousands of American lives, wins the day in public

programme.title: Evakuirajte Zemlju
Evacuate Earth
programme.desc: Is a "zombie apocalypse" simply a concept of fiction or could an infectious disease REALLY turn humanity into a race of vicious, seething monsters? The truth just might shock you! NGC examines one all too real scenario -- a pandemic caused by a mutated rabies virus. Experts from the fields of medicine, biology and the social sciences explain what could happen if humanity faced a deadly contagion for which there was is no cure. Through stunning dramatizations, watch as the virus makes its way from the depths of the ocean to every corner of the Earth turning humans and animals alike into individual vehicles of brutal destruction

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
Monster Fish
programme.desc: There are fish, …and then there are FISH. Lurking in the murky depths of the world's great waterways are bizarre giants-specimens of such enormous proportion and odd appearance they boggle the mind. In his quest to save the world's big fish, aquatic ecologist Zeb Hogan has wrangled some of the biggest freshwater fish in the world. In this episode, we follow him as he goes in search of the biggest and oldest of North America's river monsters: the White Sturgeon

programme.title: Opasni susreti
Dangerous encounters
programme.desc: To study big carnivores, researchers have to get close, very close. But how do you get within arm's length to some of the most dangerous predators on the planet who can easily take down prey that's five times your size? To find out, Dr. Brady Barr creates a protective suit that enables him to crawl alongside a Nile crocodile

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Lions, the rulers of the Savannah, are seen as being unbeatable as a pride. But even they have to fight every day for their lives. The pride located at the Ronkai River in the south of Kenya was able to ensure the safety of the majority of their offspring during the first dangerous months. But now, lean times face the animals: the huge wildebeest herds are now migrating south to the Serengeti

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Synonymous with punishing cold, parts of Siberia bake at 40 degrees Celsius. Lurking in the forests of Siberia's Yakutia region with a face like a kangaroo and vampire's teeth is the musk deer

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Located on Russia's far eastern edge is the stark peninsula of Kamchatka - a surprising place where volcanoes create a land of fire and ice

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: Travel through the majestic Primeval forests of the Urals. This Russian sanctuary is a land of extremes where giant deer, half-tonne leviathans and tiny adventures flourish

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: At the roof of the world and on the edge of civilization sits the Russian Arctic, known for its extreme temperatures, weather and hostility

programme.title: Divlja Rusija
programme.desc: The Ussuriland wilderness extends from the deep Sikhote Alin forests to the fast-flowing Amur River. Slipping through the shadows of the Ussuriland forests are two of the world's rarest cats

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Symbols of courage and power, lions have been intensively researched for many decades. But certain things remained hidden. Thanks to thermal imaging cameras, this film reveals the last secrets of Africa's largest wild cats. We follow two prides and their respective females by day and by night, discovering astonishing behavioral patterns, many of which have never been seen before

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Tons of living things get chomped, chewed and swallowed by millions and millions of other hungry creatures. In this episode, we'll give you a sneak peak at several of the season's most peculiar eating habits

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: In this giant restaurant we call Earth, insects and other arthropods are among the most popular dishes on the menu among its diverse clientele. They're capable of eating anything...but they're also delicious and highly sought after as prey

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: A battle of the miniscule itchy grub, the highly unique platypus and the mammoth water buffalo… expect nothing but pain from all three. But, which animal will top the 72 list this week

programme.title: Madagaskar
programme.desc: Separated from mainland Africa for more than a hundred million years, life on Madagascar has followed its own evolutionary path. Preserved by its isolation, it is home to a host of creatures found nowhere else… lemurs, chameleons, bizarre insects and the foosah. Madagascar is a world unto its own(c)

programme.title: Najubojitija svjetska trojka
programme.desc: These are the predators that prove that when it comes to hunting prey, size doesn’t always matter. These are the World's Deadliest: Little Killers miniscule menaces with the ability to take down prey several times their own size

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Symbols of courage and power, lions have been intensively researched for many decades. But certain things remained hidden. But now, lean times face the animals: the huge wildebeest herds are now migrating south to the Serengeti

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: What lurks beneath the water's surface could have you fighting for your life. Meet 6 of our 72 'Dangerous Animals' inflicting pain and changing lives forever

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: A battle of the miniscule itchy grub, the highly unique platypus and the mammoth water buffalo… expect nothing but pain from all three. But, which animal will top the 72 list this week

programme.title: Pitonaton
programme.desc: PYTHONATHON will chronicle the Florida Fish & Wildlife Conservation Commission's (FWC) latest effort to control the exploding Burmese python populations - a 4 week long hunting season on the invasive snakes with cash prizes to the hunters who bring in the largest and the most snakes - by following hunting teams as they try to stop the invasion and win cash prizes

programme.title: Čopor
programme.desc: Symbols of courage and power, lions have been intensively researched for many decades. But certain things remained hidden. Thanks to thermal imaging cameras, this film reveals the last secrets of Africa's largest wild cats. We follow two prides and their respective females by day and by night, discovering astonishing behavioral patterns, many of which have never been seen before

Preserved by its isolation, it is home to a host of creatures found nowhere else… lemurs, chameleons, bizarre insects and the foosah. Madagascar is a world unto its own

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Najjezovitiji ubojice
programme.desc: Giant spiders. Voracious blobs. Swamp things. It's the stuff of horror movies. But these creepy killers are real. And sometimes fact is stranger than fiction

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: US-born, African-raised Wildlife Cameraman Bob Poole begins his two-year filming assignment in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique. After decades of war, an international team of scientists and conservationists is bringing this once-legendary African national park back to its former glory. Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: Madagaskar
programme.desc: Separated from mainland Africa for more than a hundred million years, life on Madagascar has followed its own evolutionary path. Preserved by its isolation, it is home to a host of creatures found nowhere else… lemurs, chameleons, bizarre insects and the foosah. Madagascar is a world unto its own

They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Pitonaton
programme.desc: PYTHONATHON will chronicle the Florida Fish & Wildlife Conservation Commission's (FWC) latest effort to control the exploding Burmese python populations - a 4 week long hunting season on the invasive snakes with cash prizes to the hunters who bring in the largest and the most snakes - by following hunting teams as they try to stop the invasion and win cash prizes

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: US-born, African-raised Wildlife Cameraman Bob Poole begins his two-year filming assignment in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique. After decades of war, an international team of scientists and conservationists is bringing this once-legendary African national park back to its former glory. Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: Najjezovitiji ubojice
programme.desc: Giant spiders. Voracious blobs. Swamp things. It's the stuff of horror movies. But these creepy killers are real. And sometimes fact is stranger than fiction

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: It's a goldfish the size of a cow, growing up to 600 lbs and 10 feet long. Giant carp is the angler's holy grail, notoriously difficult to catch and lives in just three Southeast Asia's rivers. It's a bizarre monster with a huge head, big mouth and large shiny scales as big as a baby's hand. National Geographic Explorer and aquatic biologist, Zeb Hogan travels to Thailand and Cambodia where carp are revered and valued but also endangered

programme.title: Timbavati: Lavlji ep
programme.desc: Some of Africa's most formidable predators live in family groups. We follow the lives of three of these - lion, wild dog and hyena - as they cross paths in Timbavati, near Kruger. The Timbavati pride is a newly formed coalition of three lion brothers, three lionesses and their newborn cubs. In comparison, the Sohebeles have lost their father and their territory. The 5 youngsters are left to their own devices. We compare the structure of the lions' family group to a pack of wild dogs that visit the Timbavati, and the local hyena clan, lead by a powerful matriarch. All three families work in very different ways with one purpose- survival

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: What lurks beneath the water's surface could have you fighting for your life. Meet 6 of our 72 'Dangerous Animals' inflicting pain and changing lives forever

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: A battle of the miniscule itchy grub, the highly unique platypus and the mammoth water buffalo… expect nothing but pain from all three. But, which animal will top the 72 list this week

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Fruits come in all shapes and sizes, colors, aromas, and flavors, but they all share a common purpose: they're meant to attract animals and entice them to spread the seeds of the plants that produce them

programme.title: Divlji jelovnik
programme.desc: Some may prefer their steak well-done, but it takes a certain kind of animal to enjoy their meats rotting. Meat that's a little "past its prime" has lots of fans. In fact, there's a strange group of animals known as scavengers, carrion-feeders, or necrophages, whose purpose is to eliminate corpses that invade the earth, the rivers, and the sea every day

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Biting, stinging and tearing… drawing blood is what these animals do best. Beware, danger lurks all around

programme.title: Anakonda
programme.desc: Few snakes are feared more and understood less than the anaconda. The film shows the journey into remote and uncharted parts of the Amazon rainforest to find the truth behind the mythical beast. Lush green forests abound with colorful toucans, noisy howler monkeys, strange tapirs, and vibrant Amazon Indian tribes. But hiding in the dense vegetation and murky swamps is also the biggest and most powerful snake in the world: the anaconda

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Dr. Zeb Hogan travels down under to find an aquatic Australian icon - the Murray Cod - and to uncover why it has virtually disappeared from its namesake waterway - the Murray River. The race is on as scientists, conservationists and anglers join forces to keep these legendary monster fish alive

programme.title: Najveći svjetski ubojice
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill. Youll witness animal death strikes so fast, they cant even be captured in slow motion

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: US-born, African-raised Wildlife Cameraman Bob Poole begins his two-year filming assignment in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique. After decades of war, an international team of scientists and conservationists is bringing this once-legendary African national park back to its former glory. Poole's first job is to help sedate a lion and put a GPS-tracking collar around its neck. Lion scientist Paola Bouley needs the GPS-data to solve a baffling mystery: why is Gorongosa's lion population not growing as fast as it should

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: From the sea to the sky to the outback…Expect the unexpected from this bunch of Australia's most dangerous animals

programme.title: 72 opasne životinje Australije
programme.desc: Biting, stinging and tearing… drawing blood is what these animals do best. Beware, danger lurks all around

programme.title: Kobrina mafija
programme.desc: There's a tight-knit snake family that rules reptilian streets with impressive firepower and a fearsome reputation. Equipped with an array of deadly weapons and a bad attitude the Cobra family instills fear and chaos throughout the wilds of Africa and Asia. But who brings what to the table? The King cobra rules this beat, the Boss runs operations on the ground, The Killer and the Spitter do all the dirty work, and The Faker is the out-of-town cousin with a growing reputation

programme.title: Odiseja velikih mačaka
programme.desc: Over 30 years ago Dereck and Beverly Joubert, National Geographic Explorers in Residence, went out of a quest to understand big cats. They worked through the night, droughts and floods following lions and then leopards trying to piece together the puzzle of what makes cats unique in this environment

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine

programme.title: Anakonda
programme.desc: Few snakes are feared more and understood less than the anaconda. The film shows the journey into remote and uncharted parts of the Amazon rainforest to find the truth behind the mythical beast. Lush green forests abound with colorful toucans, noisy howler monkeys, strange tapirs, and vibrant Amazon Indian tribes. But hiding in the dense vegetation and murky swamps is also the biggest and most powerful snake in the world: the anaconda

programme.title: Pecanje čudovišta
programme.desc: Zeb Hogan is hitting the road and heading down to the Deep South in search of the truth behind the myth of giant catfish. In the swamps and bayous of the southern U.S. there are widely told stories of catfish the size of a car that can swallow a man whole. Zeb is going all in with a cast of characters only found in the Dirty South to see if there really is any truth to this epic urban legend

programme.title: Najsmrtonosnije životinje svijeta
programme.desc: Some of the deadliest predators in the animal kingdom owe their success to the fact that they don't kill alone. World's Deadliest: Packs and Swarms takes a deep dive into the world of group predation with a look at twelve different species that use teamwork to hunt more effectively than they otherwise would be able to alone

programme.title: Gepard
programme.desc: The Cheetah: the world's fastest land animal. Every fiber of its body designed to win the race for survival. We follow the destinies of a young cheetah mother and her first cubs. With determination she has to transform them from adorable kittens into bold, powerful hunters. An epic true story set against the backdrop of one of the wildest places of our planet, Cheetah: Fatal Instinct captures the real-life of the sprinters of the African savannah

programme.title: Preporod afričkoga kraljevstva divljine
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Bob Poole has been living in Gorongosa National Park, Mozambique for a while now, and the park's beauty has cast a spell on him. Now, he is forced to confront his fears and his past to team up with his sister Joyce Poole, a world-renowned elephant expert. Together they face charging elephants to uncover brand new insights into their behavior

programme.title: Prokletstvo Oak Islanda
programme.desc: Oak Island šumovit je otok na južnoj obali Nove Škotske koji već više od dva stoljeća opčinjava lovce na blago

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Shelby još nema gliser, ali srećom je tu njegov pouzdan pomoćnik Davi s "Go-Devilom" te mu pomaže obaviti posao. Na otoku Kupreanof na Aljasci ekipa "Papac" bori se za ostanak na vrhu ljestvice, odnosno za naslov "Kralja planine"

programme.title: Neustrašivi aljaški vozači
programme.desc: Butch i Bill odlučili su se napokon približiti ekipi "Lower Forty-Eighters". Carl se i dalje bori s izmučenim "Super Džipom" u nadi da još ima dovoljno snage da ostanu među vodećima

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu
programme.desc: Najvažniji zadatak u povijesti Darrellove i Lisine tvrtke mogao bi propasti, a ugroženo je i udaljeno selo. Zbog Toddove pogreške ekipa "Polar" mogla bi izgubiti posao s vladom

programme.title: Australski "skupljači"
Australski "skupljači
programme.desc: "Skupljači" prvo posjećuju Jima Crockera, kolekcionara i vlasnika odlagališta koji je stručnjak za "Furphyjeve" spremnike za vodu. Poslije odlaze u restoran "Svrakino gnijezdo" u Wagga Waggi gdje susreću Chrisa Whytea

programme.title: Sean Bean u bitci kod Waterlooa
programme.desc: Sean Bean otisnut će se na putovanje u Chatham na jugoistoku Engleske gdje skupina zaljubljenika u povijest planira sudjelovati u velikoj rekonstrukciji bitke kako bi u lipnju 2015. godine obilježili 200. obljetnicu

programme.title: Američke restauracije
programme.desc: Aparat za kokice iz 1970-ih stiže na dobro staro dotjerivanje. No nakon što je Rick projekt delegirao Brettlyju, čini se da bi aparat mogao zakazati

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Roy i Liel pokreću pregovore o kupnji tajnog recepta za protuzakonito piće koje u Južnoj Africi nazivaju "Mampoer". Visok udio alkohola obara Roya s nogu, ali Liela i dalje zanima kupnja

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu 2
programme.desc: Sezona je otvorena te za "VP Express" i "Polar Industries" počinje utrka. Ove godine obje ekipe imaju mnogo snažnijeg protivnika, polarni vrtlog, koji donosi najgore zimske uvjete u stotinu godina

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: Stari suparnik izaziva ekipu na utrku u košenju travnjaka. Phil pokušava unucima napraviti kućicu za igru

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: Willie poboljšava protuprovalni sustav nakon pokušaja provale u skladište. Njegov moderni novi sustav nadzora otkriva i što njegovo osoblje radi tijekom dana

programme.title: Borci s morskim psima
programme.desc: Brett je prisiljen zaroniti u vode pune morskih pasa kako bi ispravio pogrešku člana posade. Naporan 48-satni maraton ostavlja traga na izmučenoj posadi, no ipak su uhvatili veliku nagradu: golemu bijelu psinu(c)

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Pokraj rijeke Shelby odlazi roniti u vode koje vrve aligatorima. Na sjeveru se suparnici Rygaard i Oakes spremaju za borbu na jednosmjernoj cesti, a Rygaardov vozač umalo pogine kad mu se kamion preokrene

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice: Južna Afrika
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Neobični i predivni južnoafrički artefakti od povijesnoga značaja slijevaju se u zalagaonicu dok vlasnik Roy Peretz i njegovi partneri Liel i Eytan svakodnevno izvode vratolomije ne bi li sklopili najbolje poslove
programme.category: Izgubljeni u prijevodu, Sharks and Cobras

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Jennifer je pod pritiskom jer mora pomoći spakirati i prevesti model broda koji je izrađivan 10 godina, dok Jarrett ukrcava kutiju s iznimno vrijednim fosilnim ostacima dinosaura starima 65 milijuna godina

programme.title: Kamioni na ledu 2
programme.desc: Kamiondžije se utrkuju s Majkom prirodom dok pokušavaju dostaviti teret prije dolaska oluje stoljeća. Lisa i Art suočeni su sa smrtonosnom zaprekom na ledu, dok bi svađa Darrella i Todda mogla dovesti do raspada ekipe

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: U sjedištu tvrtke pokvari se klima uređaj u času kad počne val vrućina. Momci su odlučni u namjeri da se rashlade i kuju ludi plan o gradnji vodenog parka

programme.title: Dinastija patki
programme.desc: Jase, Martin i Godwin odlaze na ribički izlet koji završava kaosom kad Philov čamac potone na dno močvare. U međuvremenu, Willie traži novi auto za svoga sina

programme.title: Drvosječe
programme.desc: Gabe kudi mamurnog žutokljunca, ali Jason se ne slaže s njegovim stilom vođenja posla. Borba za premoć na rijeci i dalje bjesni dok se članovi ekipe Chapman međusobno svađaju, a Dreadknotsi se vode onom "zavadi pa vladaj"

programme.title: Ljudi iz močvare
programme.desc: Troy i Teksašani postavili su sebi visoke ciljeve. U međuvremenu jedan tim preuzima rizik koji ugrožava cijelu njihovu sezonu i Liz se suočava s ozbiljnom zdravstvenom krizom

programme.title: Gorštaci
programme.desc: Ova emisija prikazuje različite pojedince od Apalačkog gorja preko Stjenjaka do Aljaske i prati ih dok se hvataju ukoštac sa zimom kako bi došli do potrepština i novca koji su im potrebni da prežive najhladnije mjesece u godini

programme.title: Američki "skupljači"

programme.desc: Skupljači kreću u napad na saveznu državu Virginiju. Mike, Frank, Robbie i Danielle provjeravaju i najmanji trag

programme.category: Za dobar provod nazovi Ivyja, For a Good Time, Call Ivy

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: Podignite čaše sa zvijezdama zalagaonice kad Rick ugleda autentični kotao za izradu viskija. Corey i Chumlee su očarani kad im čovjek donese golemu zbirku razglednica iz 1940-ih i 1950-ih s potpisom slavnih osoba

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi

programme.title: Špediterski ratovi
programme.desc: Nakon što je umalo izgubio teret, Roy je prisiljen moliti Jennifer za pomoć, ali dobit će više nego što je tražio kad se njezina "pomoć" pretvori u lekciju iz bontona

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže vojna iskaznica s potpisom Marilyn Monroe. Klijent dolazi s prvim izdanjem Beethovenove 6. simfonije, a Coreyja i Antwauna ulovili su dok su se šuljali tijekom planiranja proslave Chumleejeva rođendana

programme.title: Zvijezde zalagaonice
Pawn stars
programme.desc: U zalagaonicu stiže jakna iz "Paklenog šunda". Corey zapjeva kad u zalagaonicu stignu rukavice za operu s potpisom Clarkea Gablea. Rick odlazi u dom Lonnieja Hammargrena da bi pogledao njegovu zbirku jedinstvenih predmeta

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice
programme.desc: Aaron i Shanon odlaze na obalu pogledati bagi za plažu iz 1971. godine. Dečki zatim dobivaju priliku opipati pravi suvenir australskog "rocka", kožnu jaknu koja je, kako tvrdi vlasnik, pripadala Michaelu Hutchenceu

programme.title: Australske zvijezde zalagaonice
programme.desc: Aarona i Shanona posjećuje muškarac koji im donosi staru palicu za kriket te tvrdi da su je potpisali Don Bradman i niz drugih zvijezda kriketa "Bodylinea"

programme.desc: Victor ostvaruje iznimno dobru zaradu kupnjom motora u Carrolltonu. Ricky se suočava sa svojim najvećim strahom

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi
Storage Wars
programme.desc: Dolina Perris domaćin je ranojutarnje dražbe zbog koje su se kupci digli ranom zorom i paze na uloge. Jarrod i Brandi dan počinju veselo, ali situacija se zaoštrava kad se Dave pojavi razmećući se više nego obično
programme.category: Uvijek će imati Perris, Valley Of The Hauls

programme.title: Australski "skupljači"
Australski "skupljači
programme.desc: Lucasov dan počinje razgledanjem dviju neobičnih barskih stolica u kuhinji motela u kojem su prenoćili. Uspio se dogovoriti s vlasnikom i ukrcao ih je u kamion

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi: New York
Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Kupci odlaze u Edgewater, New Jersey, i Joe P odvodi druge kupce u školu dok Mike B otvara poslovni prostor za suprugu

programme.title: Skladišni ratovi: New York
Storage Wars: New York
programme.desc: Mike se nada da će ga napustiti zla kob u Brooklynu gdje Chris i Tad kupuju skladišnu jedinicu koja ih odvodi u dome New Jersey Devilsa
programme.category: Zla kob, Pig in a Puck

programme.title: II. svjetski rat: cijena Carstva
World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.desc: Rat se ubrzano širi zapadnom Europom. Nijemci su nezaustavljivi zbog svojeg mobilnog oružja, zračnih trupa i zračnih snaga na bojišnici. Francuska će pasti u ruke nacista. (S1, Ep3)

programme.title: Tajne svemira: slavni znanstvenici
Secrets of the Universe: Great Scientists
programme.desc: Najpoznatiji fizičari 20. stoljeća odgovorni su za neka od najvažnijih znanstvenih otkrića u cijeloj ljudskoj povijesti. Promijenili su ljudsko poimanje stvari, od građe atoma do tajni svemira. Ovaj nevjerojatan dokumentarac pomoću snimki iz tog doba oživljuje ličnosti i otkrića fizičara čiji utjecaj oblikuje i današnji svijet. Otkrijte priče koje se kriju iza znanosti Alberta Einsteina, Richarda Feynmana i Stephena Hawkinga

programme.title: Vrijeme koje je promijenilo svijet
Weather that Changed the World
programme.desc: Istražujemo vremenske uvjete i lanac događaja koji je doveo do katastrofe svemirske letjelice Challenger. Raketa je eksplodirala samo minutu nakon uzlijetanja

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Tim emisije Otkrivanje vremena putuje u Somerset kako bi istražio Castle Hill i saznao je li ondje ikada postojao pravi dvorac

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Jamie putuje u Beograd kako bi istražio život, rad i uvjerenja enigmatskoga i tajanstvenoga srpskoga izumitelja, inženjera elektronike, fizičara i futurista Nikole Tesle

programme.title: II. svjetski rat: cijena Carstva
World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.desc: Rat se ubrzano širi zapadnom Europom. Nijemci su nezaustavljivi zbog svojeg mobilnog oružja, zračnih trupa i zračnih snaga na bojišnici. Francuska će pasti u ruke nacista. (S1, Ep3)

programme.title: Srednjovjekovni mrtvaci
The Medieval Dead
programme.desc: Čudesno istraživanje grobova engleskih vitezova koji su se vratili iz Agincourta i načina na koji su formirali snagu razdoblja Plantageneta

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Tim emisije Otkrivanje vremena putuje u Somerset kako bi istražio Castle Hill i saznao je li ondje ikada postojao pravi dvorac

programme.title: Izgradnja drevnoga grada
Building the Ancient City
programme.desc: Profesor Andrew Wallace-Hadrill vodi nas na putovanje kroz čudesne lokacije u Grčkoj i Italiji kako bismo otkrili kako je Atena prije 2500 godina začela ideju o gradu kojeg vode slobodni građani

programme.title: Veliki podzemni rat
The Great Underground War
programme.desc: Col di Lana manja je planina koja je postala poznata kao Krvavo brdo. Talijani su kroz nju prokopali tunel pod austrijskom obranom, te raznijeli vrh planine, pri čemu je poginulo 200 vojnika(c)

programme.title: Vrijeme koje je promijenilo svijet
Weather that Changed the World
programme.desc: Kuga u Europi prvi se put pojavila 541. godine. Ali kako se tako ravnomjerno proširila? Je li krivac "nestalo" sunce? Ako jest, zašto je sunce "nestalo"

programme.title: Muzejske tajne
Mysteries at the Museum
programme.desc: Prozirna plastična kutijica je pod istragom. Sadržava električne dijelove te je korištena u znamenitoj prijevari u kasinima u Las Vegasu. Na koji je način upotrijebljena i djeluje li zaista? (S2, Ep23)

programme.title: Lovci na Bibliju
Bible Hunters
programme.desc: Ispitat ćemo priče ljudi koji su putovali u Egipat tijekom 19. i 20. stoljeća u potrazi za najstarijim kršćanskim tekstovima. Njihova otkrića bacila su kontroverzno novo svjetlo na Bibliju

programme.title: Otkrivanje vremena
Time Team
programme.desc: Tim emisije Otkrivanje vremena kreće u Šervudsku šumu jer mještani sela Clipstone u Nottinghamshireu vjeruju da su čudesne ruševine u polju poljoprivrednika povezane s drevnim pričama o Robinu Hoodu

programme.title: Farma iz doba Viktorije
Victorian farm
programme.desc: Bliži se kraj boravku na viktorijanskoj farmi. No prvo treba obaviti žetvu pšenice, što je najvažniji zadatak u godini. Alex i Peter moraju se pritom naučiti koristiti izumom koji je u viktorijansko doba bio najnovija tehnologija. Ruth se uči vještini pletenja slame i otkriva umjetnost otiskivanja. Dečki se bave proizvodnjom domaćih alkoholnih pića. Ekipa pšenicu žanje uz pomoć drugih vrijednih ruku i pridružuje se proslavi žetve. Odabrala: Mira Vočinkić

programme.title: Znameniti špijuni
Spymasters
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o dvjema špijunkama, Zofiji Potocka koju je unovačio ruski vojni vođa Potemkin da upravlja špijunskim mrežama u Poljskoj i Mata Hari koja je unovačena kao njemačka agentica

programme.title: Karpov - Kasparov, dva kralja i jedna kruna
Karpov, Kasparov, Two Kings for a Crown
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o 25-godišnjem suparništvu između dva šahovska diva, Anatolija Karpova i Garryja Kasparova koji su vodili osobni rat u svijetu koji se razrušio

programme.title: Lovci na mitove
Myth Hunters
programme.desc: Epizoda prikazuje nevjerojatnu 17-godišnju potragu Augusta Gisslera za zakopanim piratskim blagom na Kokosovom otoku koji se smatra domom nekih od najskrivenijih bogatstava na svijetu. (S3, Ep1)

Monuments Revealed

programme.title: Tajne Biblije
Secret Bible
programme.desc: Godine 1996. arheolog Steven Collins krenuo je na misiju da pronađe Sodomu. Na jordanskim ravnicama otkrio je nevjerojatne ruševine nepoznatoga grada koji je naizgled uništila vatrena apokalipsa

programme.title: Lovci na mitove
Myth Hunters
programme.desc: Otkriće drevnog bakrenoga svitka u jordanskoj špilji dovelo je do cjeloživotne potrage mladoga britanskoga znanstvenika za izgubljenim židovskim blagom

programme.title: Izgradnja drevnoga grada

programme.desc: Jamie proučava rad njemačkog inženjera Georgea Kleina koji je prvi tvrdio da je Treći Reich razvio NLO

Myth Hunters

programme.title: Elizabeta protiv terora
Elizabeth I, War on Terror
programme.desc: Nevjerojatni dokumentarac otkriva znamenite događaje iz 1586. kad je najznačajniji engleski špijun u razdoblju od osam tjedana uveo nove špijunske tehnike kako bi spriječio atentat na Elizabetu I

programme.title: Lovci na mitove
Myth Hunters
programme.desc: Tajna paukovih stijena Prema legendi negdje u Texasu zakopano je veliko blago sa španjolskim zlatom. Na prijelazu 20. st. Jedan čovjek kreće na misiju da ga pronađe. Njegovo je ime Dave Arnold. (S3, Ep2)

programme.title: Muzejske tajne
Mysteries at the Museum
programme.desc: Don Wildman ponovno se prisjeća nekih od najdojmljivijih neriješenih slučajeva u arhivu Muzejskih tajni. Vraća nas na otok Alcatraz u San Franciscu, muzej koji je nekada bio zloglasni zatvor. (S2, Ep25)

programme.title: Posljednji dani Anne Boleyn
The Last Days of Anne Boleyn
programme.desc: Priča o iznenadnom i nasilnom padu Anne Boleyn obuzela je i žestoko podijelila povjesničare. Emisija istražuje tko je Anne uistinu bila i zašto je ona prva pogubljena kraljica

programme.title: Zabranjena povijest
Forbidden History
programme.desc: Jamie putuje u Rumunjsku naoružan češnjakom i raspelom kako bi istražio ima li legenda o vampirima uporište u stvarnosti

programme.title: Karpov - Kasparov, dva kralja i jedna kruna
Karpov, Kasparov, Two Kings for a Crown
programme.desc: Ovo je priča o 25-godišnjem suparništvu između dva šahovska diva, Anatolija Karpova i Garryja Kasparova koji su vodili osobni rat u svijetu koji se razrušio

programme.title: II. svjetski rat: cijena Carstva
World War II: The Price of Empire
programme.desc: Njemačka želi neutralizirati britanske snage iz zraka u Bici za Britaniju. Luftwaffe je odbijen, ali počinje Blitz. Nijemci kreću u Sjevernu Afriku podržati svoje saveznike. (S1, Ep4)

programme.title: Tajne operacije
Black Ops
programme.desc: Skupina terorista nadzire područje u Iračkom Kurdistanu. Specijalne snage američke vojske odlaze ih eliminirati uz potporu kurdskih boraca Peshmerga

programme.title: Obalna straža Aljaske
Coast Guard Alaska
programme.desc: Obalna straža ima tri osjetljiva zadatka u kojima je najvažnija brzina: mora spasiti mornara kojemu su odrezani prsti, ozlijeđenog planinara i putnika na krstarici sa simptomima moždanog udara

programme.title: Radionica Graveyard Carz
Graveyard Carz
programme.desc: Redatelj i glavni glumac filma Sablast, Don Coscarelli i Michael Baldwin, dolaze u Graveyard Carz da bi razgledali automobil posvećen filmu i, po mogućnosti, provozali se u njemu po gradu

Timber Kings

programme.title: Kraljevi drva

How It Works

programme.title: Nada za divljinu
Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Nešto vrlo dragocjeno. Dva se siročića bore za život, a Hope nakon jednog neuspješnog puštanja pokušava ponovno. Hoće li ovaj put uspjeti

programme.title: Nada za divljinu
Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Pucanj u prazno. Na Hopeina vrata stiže vrlo neobično lane, a na nekom drugom mjestu groblje postaje jezovito poprište neočekivanog susreta

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Labrador Mojo ima problem s kralježnicom zbog kojeg bi mogao ostati paraliziran, a Noel mora obaviti revolucionarni zahvat na mački sa smrskanom zdjelicom da bi joj omogućio da ponovno prohoda

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Vlasnica Diane dovodi svoju dvanaestogodišnju mačku Pixie koju je udario automobil. Noel vjeruje da će Pixie ponovno hodati kad joj ugradi revolucionarni implantat

programme.title: Nada za divljinu
Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Jedan običan dan. Hope i ekipa pripremaju rijetku sovu za puštanje - no hoće li poletjeti

programme.title: Bolnica za male životinje
Small Animal Hospital
programme.desc: John posjećuje dermatološku veterinarsku ordinaciju i upoznaje boksera Baileyja koji se ne može prestati češkati. Tu je i zlatna retriverica koja jako šepa i možda će joj biti potrebna operacija

programme.title: Bolnica za male životinje
Small Animal Hospital
programme.desc: Veterinari revolucionarnom operacijom pokušavaju spasiti oko škotske ovčarke Molly, a John za to vrijeme pomaže prilikom hidroterapije za jorkširskog terijera imenom Cheeky Boy

programme.title: Bebe iz Zoo vrta
Zoo Juniors
programme.desc: Svaka je životinja posebna: narančasta dlaka langura uvijek privlači posjetitelje, mladunče leoparda Timang ima jak karakter za macu, a majmunica Xena tako je posebna da s timariteljom odlazi kući

programme.title: Bebe iz Zoo vrta
Zoo Juniors
programme.desc: Mladunčad u zoološkom vrtu uživa u prvoklasnim obrocima i usluzi - Zamuca, primjerice, hrane na bočicu u sobi za timaritelje, a nilski konji imaju golemi bazen samo za sebe

programme.title: Harnas -utočište za divlje životinje
Harnas, Wildlife Rescue Camp
programme.desc: Ekipu čeka naporan dan jer moraju goniti nojeve u novu nastambu. Nije im lako jer nojevi mogu trčati brzinom do 70 km/h(c)

programme.title: Superveterinar
The Supervet
programme.desc: Pola je Fitzpatrickovih bolesnika pretilo. Šestogodišnji buldog Louis, primjerice, obožava sir i sladoled, zbog čega mora na dijetu i hidroterapiju

programme.title: Selidbe životinja
Animal Movers
programme.desc: Noć u akvariju. James u San Diegu odlazi u akvarij da bi saznao kako može premjestiti žive koralje - jedne od najmanjih oceanskih životinja

programme.title: Pseći najbolji prijatelj
Dog's Best Friend
programme.desc: Upoznajte Bonediggera, lava čiji je omiljeni član čopora Abby - sićušni jazavčar. A kuja Annabelle voli odmarati dok joj najbolja prijateljica, sova Louise, timari krzno

programme.title: Harnas -utočište za divlje životinje
Harnas, Wildlife Rescue Camp
programme.desc: Volonteri u Harnasu svjedoče lovačkim vještinama njihova četverometarskog pitona koji je progutao cijelu antilopu

programme.title: Vulkanske odiseje
Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Vatre Peleea. Iznenadno propadanje tla kratera i snažna erupcija ispraznili su lavu iz vulkana Kilauea na Havajima, pa možemo istražiti formacije vulkanskih stijena nastale tijekom tisuća godina prolaska lave

programme.title: Vulkanske odiseje
Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Dijete vatre. Kad Tom Pfeiffer sazna da vulkan Anak Krakatoa ulazi u neobuzdano stanje, brzo hvata let za Indoneziju da bi promatrao Dijete vatre kako ponavlja ponašanje svojeg pretka

programme.title: Reprint Čede Kapora
programme.desc: Godine 1938. u Barceloni mladi interbrigadist i antifašist Čedo Kapor ušetao je u štamparski kolektiv i ugledao knjigu. Želio ju je kupiti po svaku cijenu, ali nije imao konzervu mesa koliko je koštala. Nakon što je sutradan saznao da je posljednji primjerak prodan, počeo je potragu! Sudbina Čede Kapora i knjige ukrsitit će se i neraskidivo vezati, a ubrzo kreću na opasno, neizvjesno, ali i uzbudljivo putovanje

programme.title: Regioskop - Presuda u Mađarskoj
programme.desc: Filmska ekipa je tri godine pratila suđenje članovima mađarske kriminalne bande, optuženim za rasno motivisana ubistva šest Roma, uključujući i djecu. Policiji je trebalo više od godinu da uhapsi osumnjičene, a cijeli slučaj je predugo trajao - uglavnom zbog nedostatka dokaza i ogromnih policijskih propusta

programme.title: O hokeju i Medvjedima
programme.desc: Film „O hokeju i Medvjedima snimao se od 2009. godine, a govori o uspjesima zagrebačkog hokeja kroz priču o KHL Medveščak Zagreb - od njegovog osnivanja 1961. do danas. Osim historijskog presjeka, filmom se kroz svjedočenja ključnih pojedinaca iz prošlosti kluba, ali i sadašnjih članova te vodećih ljudi kluba nastoji autentično zabilježiti fenomen popularnosti „Medvjeda kao i jedinstven navijački duh Medveščakove publike(c)

programme.title: Reprint Čede Kapora
programme.desc: Godine 1938. u Barceloni mladi interbrigadist i antifašist Čedo Kapor ušetao je u štamparski kolektiv i ugledao knjigu. Želio ju je kupiti po svaku cijenu, ali nije imao konzervu mesa koliko je koštala. Nakon što je sutradan saznao da je posljednji primjerak prodan, počeo je potragu! Sudbina Čede Kapora i knjige ukrsitit će se i neraskidivo vezati, a ubrzo kreću na opasno, neizvjesno, ali i uzbudljivo putovanje

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Optužbe za blasfemiju imaju kobne posljedice u Pakistanu, no neki riskiraju svoje živote kako bi izvršili pritiske na pravosudne organe da reformišu taj zakon. U Pakistanu je protivzakonito davati pogrdne komentare o poslaniku Muhamedu ili oskrnaviti Kur'an. Često se dešava da se ljudi zatvaraju samo na osnovu izjava svjedoka, bez bilo kakvog konkretnog dokaza. Nažalost, u dosta slučajeva lokalno stanovništvo uzima pravdu u svoje ruke, kamenujući ljude koji su optuženi za blesfemiju

programme.title: Regioskop
programme.desc: Preci Alberta Mayera su iz Njemačke naseljeni u Banat po povlačenju Turaka iz tih krajeva sredinom 18. vijeka. Bavili su se zemljoradnjom i bili dobrostojeći seljaci. Film prati sudbinu porodice Mayer te govori o složenim društveno-političkim događajima tokom Drugog svjetskog rata i vremenu neposredno po stvaranju Titove Jugoslavije

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala "Širom svijeta" putujemo u Tursku, gdje istažujemo glamurozni svijet mode pokrivenih muslimanki i otkrivamo kakve je društvene promjene donio Turskoj. Poslije uspostave Republike Turske 1923. godine, muslimanke u Turskoj su bile ograničene zabranama vezano za odijevanje po islamskim propisima. Međutim, usponom AK partije i njihovim dolaskom na vlast, mnoge žene u Turskoj ponovno bez bojazni mogu nositi hidžab

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: Planine Qinling protežu se na više od 1500 kilometara u kineskoj provinciji Shaanxi. Razdvajaju sjever i jug zemlje. Mnoga sela u regiji, koja se smatraju kolijevkom kineske civilizacije, nalaze se na velikoj nadmorskoj visini, a neka i na više od 3000 metara. U toj planinskoj regiji pratimo tim državnih službenika koji putuju na motorima u pokušaju da se i u tim udaljenim planinskim zajednicama riješe nagomilani problemi u skladu sa zakonom

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala „Moj život pratimo put bivšeg člana bande dok liječi rane iz prošlosti i pokušava zamisliti bolju budućnost

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Tajland je popularna destinacija za turiste iz cijelog svijeta. U svojoj ponudi ova zemlja nudi i posjete zoo vrtovima i nacionalnim parkovima, gdje se mogu vidjeti i ugrožene životinjske vrste, poput tigrova, slonova ili zaštićenih vrsta majmuna. Ove životinje su rođene u zatočeništvu i posjetioci parkova od lokalnih vodiča ne čuju tamnu stranu priče , a to je da su ove životinje u ogromnom broju slučajeva zlostavljane. Vlada Tajlanda je nedavno donijela zakon o zaštiti ovih životinja, ali kritičari tvrde da se on u praksi ne provodi

programme.title: Vrhovi Balkana
programme.desc: Ono što je Grcima Olimp, Bugarima Rila, Hrvatima Velebit, Slovencima Triglav, to je Makedoncima Šar planina. U samoj Makedoniji ona je po mnogo čemu kultna. Istražili smo sve o šarplanincu - mitskom psu, koji je dobio ime po planini sa čijih obronaka vodi porijeklo. Zna li šarplaninac brojati i u čemu je tajna činjenice da ovi psi prepoznaju pojedinačno svaku od više stotina ovaca, otkriva nam profesor Muhić. Na Šar planini ima mnogo jezera, još više vrhova iznad 2000 metara nadmorske visine, prostranih pašnjaka... Sve ovo pokriva 1600 kilometara kvadratnih, čime je treća planina po površini na Balkanu. Šar planina je duga 80, a široka blizu 30 kilometara.Na vrh se penjemo sa Ilinom Arsovom, prvom i za sada jedinom Makedonkom koja se popela na Mount Everest i time ušla u historiju tamošnjeg planinarstva. Ilina nam otkriva tajne Šar planine i zašto se baš ovdje pripremala za uspon na Mount Everest(c)

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, ruski predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi kao najmoćniji čovjek ove zemlje i kao jedan od najutjecajnijih političara na planeti. U četri dijela ovoga serijala bili smo u Rusiji, gdje smo se na licu mjesta uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljajali pitanje zašto većina Rusa voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta, zapravo, stanovnici Rusije žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome. U trećem dijelu serijala Tragom Putinove Rusije autor filma istražuje zašto i na koji način ruski predsjednik 25 godina nakon hladnog rata ponovno poziconira Rusiju kao globalnu vojnu silu, razvitak novog nauružanja, ali i indirektno ili aktivno učešće snaga Vojske Rusije u sukobima na istoku Ukarjine, aneksiji Krima ili ratu u Siriji. Istražuje se i kakva je uloga ruske pravoslavne crkve i njene podrške aktuelnoj vlasti, kakav je odnos s drugim vjerskim zajednicama. Naš reporter je bio u posjeti Dagestanu, gdje je razgovarao sa stanovnicima ove republike i o položaju tamošnjih muslimana

programme.title: Širom svijeta
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala "Širom svijeta" putujemo u Tursku, gdje istažujemo glamurozni svijet mode pokrivenih muslimanki i otkrivamo kakve je društvene promjene donio Turskoj. Poslije uspostave Republike Turske 1923. godine, muslimanke u Turskoj su bile ograničene zabranama vezano za odijevanje po islamskim propisima. Međutim, usponom AK partije i njihovim dolaskom na vlast, mnoge žene u Turskoj ponovno bez bojazni mogu nositi hidžab

programme.title: Većina počinje ovdje
programme.desc: Film prati šest mladih ljudi iz bivših jugoslovenskih republika dok putujući regionom istražuju uticaj ratova s kraja prošlog vijeka na njihove živote i budućnost

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Kako se osjeća rođeni Argentinac koji je živio u Čileu, a naših je korijena, ili rođena Sarajka koja se nakon Amerike, Francuske i Njemačke skrasila u Zagrebu? Gdje im je dom, koji je njihov nacionalni identitet? Na ova pitanja odgovaraju ESTEBAN STEVAN MILOVIĆ i TATJANA GALIĆ. Stevan je rođen u Argentini. Roditelji su mu iz Bosne i Hercegovine i Hrvatske. Dolazeći s porodicom preko ljeta, odlučio je ostati u Trebinju jer je tu pronašao svoj mir, ali i posao. On je, naime, jedan od najvećih uzgajivača jabuka i trešanja na ovom području, od čega izdržava svoje sedmero djece. Tatjana je doktor nauka iz oblasti mikrobiologije koja je u Zagrebu pokrenula ordinaciju za biorezonancu kojom pomaže brojnim ljudima da dovedu svoj organizam u prirodni balans. Oni nam govore o svom poimanju vlastitog identiteta i specifičnim kvalitetima života u Zagrebu i Trebinju

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: ENES KAHRIMANOVIĆ i NESTOR SLEPČEV napustili su svoje rodne gradove nevoljko, još u mladosti, u potrazi za boljom i sigurnijom egzistencijom. Trudom i radom cijeli su život tražili svoje mjesto pod suncem i nalaze ga, nakon mnogo lutanja, ipak u svom zavičaju. Enes je nakon brojnih poslova na Zapadu, svojom ambicijom, ali i dovitljivošću, uspio u rodni Kozarac dovesti veliku austrijsku firmu, otvoriti fabriku i zaposliti pedesetak ljudi, te tako od vozača viljuškara u Austriji postati jedan od najuspješnijih menadžera u BIH. Nestor je, pak, kao avioinženjer izgradio uspješnu karijeru vani, ali je nostalgija bila prejaka te se odlučio vratiti u Vojvodinu i početi ispočetka, ali na svom. Danas je vlasnik etno sela u kojem se i dalje bavi konstrukcijom aviona iz Drugog svjetskog rata i pravljenjenjem fijakera. Oni govore o uređenim sistemima "tamo" i o neuređenosti "ovdje" i svojim pokušajima i načinima da se njihova mjesta urede po zapadnim principima, ali da ne izgube ono zbog čega su se u njih i vratili. Nama već poznati internacionalni ambasadori i ovdje daju svoj osvrt, precizno detektirajući prednosti i mane ovdašnjih društveno-političkih sistema

programme.title: Tragom Putinove Rusije
programme.desc: Vladimir Putin, ruski predsjednik koji suverno vlada Rusijom, slovi kao najmoćniji čovjek ove zemlje i kao jedan od najutjecajnijih političara na planeti. U četri dijela ovoga serijala bili smo u Rusiji, gdje smo se na licu mjesta uvjerili u moć Putinove Rusije. Razgovarali smo s mnogim Rusima i postavljajali pitanje zašto većina Rusa voli Putina, glasa za njega i šta, zapravo, stanovnici Rusije žele za sebe i svoju zemlju, te kakva je uloga Putina u tome. U trećem dijelu serijala Tragom Putinove Rusije autor filma istražuje zašto i na koji način ruski predsjednik 25 godina nakon hladnog rata ponovno poziconira Rusiju kao globalnu vojnu silu, razvitak novog nauružanja, ali i indirektno ili aktivno učešće snaga Vojske Rusije u sukobima na istoku Ukarjine, aneksiji Krima ili ratu u Siriji. Istražuje se i kakva je uloga ruske pravoslavne crkve i njene podrške aktuelnoj vlasti, kakav je odnos s drugim vjerskim zajednicama. Naš reporter je bio u posjeti Dagestanu, gdje je razgovarao sa stanovnicima ove republike i o položaju tamošnjih muslimana

programme.title: Moj život
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala „Moj život pratimo put bivšeg člana bande dok liječi rane iz prošlosti i pokušava zamisliti bolju budućnost

programme.title: Lica Kine
programme.desc: U ovoj epizodi serijala Lica Kine pratimo mlade Kineze koji su tek završili fakultet i žele osigurati prvi posao. Budući da se na objavljene konkurse javlja sve veći broj kandidata, neki od njih neće biti u stanju naći posao. Reditelj filma prati dvoje mladih koji su tek diplomirali i stječe uvid u njihove želje i frustracije

programme.title: Regioskop
programme.desc: Preci Alberta Mayera su iz Njemačke naseljeni u Banat po povlačenju Turaka iz tih krajeva sredinom 18. vijeka. Bavili su se zemljoradnjom i bili dobrostojeći seljaci. Film prati sudbinu porodice Mayer te govori o složenim društveno-političkim događajima tokom Drugog svjetskog rata i vremenu neposredno po stvaranju Titove Jugoslavije

programme.title: Regioskop - U potrazi za porodicom
programme.desc: Rođen u Sarajevu s vodom na mozgu i prognozom da će umrijeti nakon svega par mjeseci, napušten po rođenju - Oggi Tomić nije imao sretan početak života. Uprkos svemu i zahvaljujući ljubaznosti neznanaca, 27 godina kasnije Oggi je zdrav, sretno oženjen i živi u Velikoj Britaniji. Nakon što je djetinjstvo proveo u ratu, na ivici gladi i pod neprestanom opasnošću od granata, i kada se činilo da mu život kreće pravim tokom, Oggija poziva davno izgubljena porodica. To je trenutak o kojem svako siroče sanja. Ali stvari nisu baš jednostavne. Oggi saznaje da su članovi porodice, koju je cijeli život želio pronaći, isti oni „ljudi sa brda koji su Sarajevo držali pod opsadom 1300 dana. Snažna i duboka priča o Oggijevom povratku u Bosnu i nevjerovatnom susretu s porodicom ispričana je u prvom licu. Priča o identitetu i osjećaju pripadnosti, ličnom i nacionalnom

programme.title: Priče s Istoka
programme.desc: Tajland je popularna destinacija za turiste iz cijelog svijeta. U svojoj ponudi ova zemlja nudi i posjete zoo vrtovima i nacionalnim parkovima, gdje se mogu vidjeti i ugrožene životinjske vrste, poput tigrova, slonova ili zaštićenih vrsta majmuna. Ove životinje su rođene u zatočeništvu i posjetioci parkova od lokalnih vodiča ne čuju tamnu stranu priče , a to je da su ove životinje u ogromnom broju slučajeva zlostavljane. Vlada Tajlanda je nedavno donijela zakon o zaštiti ovih životinja, ali kritičari tvrde da se on u praksi ne provodi

programme.title: Ljudi i moć
programme.desc: Može li se Republika Gruzija distancirati od ruskog ekspanzionizma ili će je unutrašnja podjela povući prema sukobu

programme.title: Hoću kući
programme.desc: Zdravstvo je često jedan od oglednih primjera zaostalosti i sistematske neuređenosti zbog koje ljudi napuštaju regiju. U ovoj epizodi upoznat ćemo MIODRAGA STOJKOVIĆA, genetičara sa svjetskim naučnim uspjesima koji se vratio u rodni Leskovac i tamo osnovao Kliniku za umjetnu oplodnju koja je postala poznata čak i izvan granica Srbije. On nam govori o prirodnosti samog povratka i njegovoj želji da se u Srbiji zaustavi bijela kuga. Drugi akter ove epizode više nije među živima, ali njegova ostavština pomaže ljudima nevesinjskoga kraja da ostanu u životu. MIHAJLO LABALO je, naime, umro prije nekoliko godina, ali je kao povratnik u Nevesinje, svojim vlastitim sredstvima izgradio bolnicu po svjetskim standardima upravo u svom rodnom Nevesinju. O Mihajlu pričaju njegovi poznanici i sugrađani koji ističu važnost bolnice kako za one koji se vraćaju u taj kraj, tako i one koji žele ostati jer im je zdravstevna njega nadohvat ruke
